decoworld.server.achievements

Class AchievementsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.server.achievements.AchievementsManager

  • public class AchievementsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A "communication platform" for all achievement-related events. This class is used to facilitate the transfer of informations between the client, the achievement controller, and the DAO's. The class is responsible for: - Handling AchievementMessage's caught in Server.receive() - Storing tuples in ACHIEVEMENTS and PLAYERACHIEVEMENTS tables - Retrieving informations stored in ACHIEVEMENTS and PLAYERACHIEVEMENTS tables - Sending achievement-related messages to the clients

      • isCompletedForClient

        public int isCompletedForClient(decoworld.protocol.resources.ClientConnection client,
                       java.lang.String title)
        Query the PLAYERACHIEVEMENTS table to see if a particular achievement has been completed for a particular player. Send a ServerErrorMessage to the client if an error occurs
        Parameters:
        client - The ClientConnection representing the player
        title - The title of the achievement
        Returns:
        0 if the achievement isn't completed 1 if the achievement is completed -1 if the DB couldn't be accessed

                                java.lang.String title,
                                java.lang.String statusMessage)
        Update the status of an achievement in the achievement menu (Client side) Send a ServerErrorMessage to the client if an error occurs
        Parameters:
        client - The ClientConnection representing the player
        title - The title of the achievement
        statusMessage - The status to be displayed in the menu. SHOULD BE CONCISE!

      • setAchievementStatus

        public void setAchievementStatus(decoworld.protocol.resources.ClientConnection client,
                        java.lang.String title,
                        java.lang.String status)
        Store the current status of an achievement for a particular player in PLAYERACHIEVEMENTS table.
        Parameters:
        client - The ClientConnection representing the player
        title - The title of the achievement
        statusMessage - The status to be stored

      • getAchievementStatus

        public java.lang.String getAchievementStatus(decoworld.protocol.resources.ClientConnection client,
                                    java.lang.String title)
        Retrieve the current status of an achievement for a particular player in PLAYERACHIEVEMENTS table. Send a ServerErrorMessage to the client if an error occurs
        Parameters:
        client - The ClientConnection representing the player
        title - The title of the achievement
        Returns:
        The status currently stored, or "ERROR" if an error occurred or "INACTIVE" if there is no tuple in the table corresponding to the primary key (client.username / title)

      • achievementIsActive

        public int achievementIsActive(decoworld.protocol.resources.ClientConnection client,
                      java.lang.String title)
        Query the PLAYERACHIEVEMENTS table to see if an achievement is active. Send a ServerErrorMessage to the client if an error occurs
        Parameters:
        client - The ClientConnection representing the player
        title - The title of the achievement
        Returns:
        0 : not started yet 1 : active -1 : is already completed -3 : error connecting to database
